alert.note: Alert for Chesapeake; Suffolk (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 14 at 6:42PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Camden, northwestern Pasquotank, and northeastern Gates Counties, the southwestern City of Chesapeake and the southeastern City of Suffolk through 730 PM EDT... At 642 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Corapeake, or 7 miles north of Sunbury, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Sunbury, South Mills, Chesapeake, Suffolk, Morgans Corner, Corapeake, Horseshoe, Lynchs Corner, Pierceville, Acorn Hill, Savage, Tar Corner, Sharon, Lilly and Johnsons Corner. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
